```{r setup, include=FALSE}
.libPaths(Sys.getenv("R_LIBS_USER"))

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# detach all libraries

detachAllPackages <- function() {
  basic.packages <- c("package:stats", "package:graphics", "package:grDevices", "package:utils", "package:datasets", "package:methods", "package:base")
  package.list <- search()[ifelse(unlist(gregexpr("package:", search()))==1, TRUE, FALSE)]
  package.list <- setdiff(package.list, basic.packages)
  if (length(package.list)>0)  for (package in package.list) detach(package,  character.only=TRUE)
}
detachAllPackages()

# function to load libraries

pkgTest <- function(pkg){
  new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[,  "Package"])]
  if (length(new.pkg)) 
    install.packages(new.pkg,  dependencies = TRUE)
  sapply(pkg,  require,  character.only = TRUE)
}

# knitr

knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options){
  if(!is.null(options$max_height)){
    paste('<pre style = "max-height:', options$max_height, '; float: left; width: 910px; overflow-y: auto;">', x, "</pre>", sep = "")
  }else{
    x
  }
  
})

# loading packages 
lapply(c("tidyverse"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("readr"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("kableExtra"),pkgTest)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
local({

  knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options) {
    if (!is.null(options$max.height)) options$attr.output <- c(
      options$attr.output,
      sprintf('style="max-height: %s;"', options$max.height)
    )
    hook_output(x, options)
  })
})
```

### Importing Data  

```{r}
Community_Overall_Sample <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carolinelee78/MIAU-exer-FA/main/Exercise_Com_Overall.csv")

MTurk_Overall_Sample <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carolinelee78/MIAU-exer-FA/main/Exercise_MTurk_Overall.csv")

SMU_Overall_Sample <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carolinelee78/MIAU-exer-FA/main/Exercise_SMU_Overall.csv")
```

### Analysis

```{r, results='asis'}
ComMTurk_Overall_Sample <- merge(Community_Overall_Sample, MTurk_Overall_Sample, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Combined_Overall_Sample <- merge(ComMTurk_Overall_Sample, SMU_Overall_Sample, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Combined_Overall_NoPN <- Combined_Overall_Sample[ ,c(1, 5:8, 11:15, 19:23)]

Combined_NoPN_NoNum <- Combined_Overall_NoPN[,-1]

Combined_Overall_NoPN$LoadedFactor <- apply(Combined_NoPN_NoNum, 1, function(i) paste(colnames(Combined_NoPN_NoNum)[!is.na(i) ], collapse = ", "))
                                        
color.me <- which(Combined_Overall_NoPN$LoadedFactor == 'SMU_F8_Flo')
```

```{r, results='hide'}
function1 <- function(x) {
  count.fields(textConnection(Combined_Overall_NoPN$LoadedFactor[x]), sep = ",", blank.lines.skip = FALSE)
}

table(function1(1:312))
```

```{r}
FL_count <- as.list(function1(1:312)) # number of factor loadings per item 

### ZERO FACTOR LOADINGS ###

# red list, items that did not load on any factor =========================== RED 1 START

zeroFL <- which(FL_count == 0)

### ONE FACTOR LOADING ###

# =========================================================================== RED 1 END

oneFL <- which(FL_count == 1) # subsetting for items that loaded on one factor only

oneFL_df <- Combined_Overall_NoPN[oneFL, ]

oneFL_df$loadedFL <- apply(oneFL_df[,-1], 1, function(z) na.omit(z)[1])

oneFL_df$loadedFL <- as.numeric(oneFL_df$loadedFL)

# green list, items that loaded >.4 on one factor, no cross-loadings ======= GREEN 1 START

oneFL_grp4 <- which(abs(oneFL_df$loadedFL)>= .40)

oneFL_grp4 <- oneFL_df[oneFL_grp4, ]

oneFL_grp4_items <- oneFL_grp4$Item_No 

# ========================================================================== GREEN 1 END

# yellow list, items that loaded on one factor only but with <.4 loading === YELLOW 1 START

oneFL_lst4 <- which(abs(oneFL_df$loadedFL) < .40)

oneFL_lst4 <- oneFL_df[oneFL_lst4, ]

oneFL_lst4_items <- oneFL_lst4$Item_No

# ========================================================================== YELLOW 1 END

### TWO FACTOR LOADINGS 


```
